content:
"""
    Divide a by b.
    
    Args:
        a: The dividend (numerator)
        b: The divisor (denominator)
    
    Returns:
        The result of a divided by b
    
    Raises:
        ZeroDivisionError: If b is zero
    """
description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b (not by 0), and add robust error handling for division by zero with proper type checking and a descriptive error message. Also enhance the docstring to document the exception behavior. - Enhance docstring to document parameters, return value, and ZeroDivisionError exception

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b (not by 0), and add robust error handling for division by zero with proper type checking and a descriptive error message. Also enhance the docstring to document the exception behavior.
